sentence.Network_en: People are still terribly apprehensive about the future.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们对于将来仍然非常担心。

sentence.Network_en: I was a little apprehensive about the effects of what I had said.
sentence.Network_cn: 我有点担忧我说的话的后果。

sentence.Network_en: He was rather apprehensive of failure.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... analytical 善于分析的 apprehensive 有理解力的； aspiring 有志气的，有抱负的.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... apprehension n． 焦虑，担忧 apprehensive adj． 恐惧的，担心的 apprise v． 通知，告诉.
[英语学习]描写人性格的英语单词[1] - 豆丁网 ... analytical 善于分析的 apprehensive 忧虑的； aspiring 有志气的，有抱负的.
表态度的英语单词_百度知道 ... concerned adj. 关心的, 有关的 apprehensive adj. 担忧，担心 mixed 喜忧参半.

list.abs: ...群体对个体的积极或消极反应都会有增强作用。这一现象的出现主要是由于以下三个因素，评价顾忌(evaluation apprehension)、分心以及纯粹在场。人们通常想知道别人是如何评价我们的.
...的前三版，分别是1952年的DSM-Ⅰ，1968年的DSM-Ⅱ，与1980年第三次修订版DSM-Ⅲ。direct apprehension 指导抉择治疗法属于心理治疗方法之一。此法的基本假设是，个体适应不良的根本原因，是他不能因时因地制宜，做出适当的抉择.
沟通焦虑(Communication apprehension)沟通焦虑是指在口头沟通或书面沟通中,经历的过度紧张与不安,因而影响沟通的技巧。高度口头沟通焦虑的人通常会扭曲其工作的沟通需求.
apprehension of knowledge 知识的领会apprehension span 识别广度apprehension 

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in sense 2): from French appréhensif or medieval Latin apprehensivus, from Latin apprehendere 'seize, grasp' (see apprehend)

entry.def: Someone who is apprehensive is afraid that something bad may happen.

example.ex: People are still terribly apprehensive about the future.
example.tran: 人们对于将来仍然非常担心。

sentences.sentence: "a kind and apprehensive friend"- Nathaniel Hawthorne

means.word_mean: 2. mentally upset over possible misfortune or danger etc; worried;

sentences.sentence: "not used to a city and anxious about small things"

means.word_mean: 3. in fear or dread of possible evil or harm;

auth_sentence.content: He was inwardly apprehensive as well as outwardly adventurous.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was inwardly apprehensive as well as outwardly adventurous.

auth_sentence.content: I was apprehensive when first asked to take part.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was apprehensive when first asked to take part.

auth_sentence.content: The administration was apprehensive about expanding offshore drilling.
auth_sentence.res_content: The administration was apprehensive about expanding offshore drilling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The administration was apprehensive about expanding offshore drilling.

means.word_mean: 不安的；害怕的；担心的；恐惧的；焦虑的

sentences.en: He was rather apprehensive of failure.
She was deeply apprehensive about her future.
sentences.cn: 她对未来感到非常担心。

sentences.en: The long delay had made me quite apprehensive.
sentences.cn: 长时间的耽搁使我相当焦虑。
